name: Snow Ooze
description: The Snow Ooze is a large ooze creature that resembles a patch of snow, ambushing unsuspecting travelers. It possesses a semi-transparent, gelatinous form that blends seamlessly with its icy environment.
memorable: Its ability to blind creatures and control the battlefield with snow-based attacks and ambushing tactics makes it a formidable opponent.
goals: To dominate frigid environments and ambush unsuspecting creatures.
relations: Related to other oozes, it may inhabit areas alongside frost-themed creatures.
environment: Typically found in snowy and icy terrains.
strengths: High durability with significant hit points and powerful cold damage attacks.
weaknesses: Very low Dexterity and Intelligence, making it less agile and strategic.
attacks: The Snow Ooze delivers powerful pseudopod strikes and can execute a devastating avalanche attack.
most_powerful_ability: Snow Blindness, allowing it to blind creatures that start their turn within 30 feet unless they succeed on a saving throw.
senses: Blindsight up to 60 feet enables it to sense creatures around it without sight.
skills: Possesses passive Perception of 11, aiding in detecting nearby creatures.
additional_information: Amorphous ability allows movement through narrow spaces easily.
False Appearance lets it disguise itself as snow when motionless.
Ice Walk allows it to traverse icy surfaces without difficulty.
Ooze Nature means it doesn't require sleep.
Snow Burrower ability permits burrowing through snow and ice easily.
